TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PersistenceParticipant extends System.Object

summary.span: 此类允许 和 均参与保留过程。

span.span: This class allows both and to participate in persistence process.

summary.span: 持久性参与者派生自 类或 类（ 类的派生类），实现抽象方法，然后添加类的实例作为工作流实例扩展。

span.span: A persistence participant derives from the class or the class (derived class of the class), implements abstract methods, and then add an instance of the class as a workflow instance extension.

summary.span: 和 在保留实例时查找此类扩展，并在适当的时间调用适当的方法。

span.span: The and look for such extensions when persisting an instance and invoke appropriate methods at appropriate times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主在保留实例时执行以下步骤（或阶段）：A host executes the following steps (or stages) when persisting an instance: 1. 收集要保留的值。Collects values to be persisted. 2. 将整体结构化类的字段映射到单独的值。Maps fields of monolithic structured values to individual values. 3. 向持久性提供程序发出 。Issues the to the persistence provider. 4. 在持久性事务下执行 I/O。Performs I/O under the persistence transaction. 宿主将完成一个阶段，之后再开始下一个阶段。A host completes a stage before beginning the next stage. 例如，在保留时，宿主将从所有持久性参与者处收集值，之后再转移到第二个阶段。For example when persisting, the host collects values from all the persistence participants before moving to the second stage. 在第二个阶段中，宿主会将第一个阶段中收集的所有值提供给第二个阶段中的所有持久性参与者进行映射。In the second stage, the host provides all the values collected in the first stage to all persistence participants in the second stage for mapping. 在第三个阶段中，宿主会在调用 时将第一个和第二个阶段中收集的所有值提供给持久性提供程序。In the third stage, the host provides all the collected values in the first and second stages to the persistence provider when invoking the . 然后，在第四个阶段中，主机会在持久性事务下将所有收集的值提供给所有持久性 IO 参与者。Then in the fourth stage, the host provides all the collected values to all the persistence IO participants under the persistence transaction. 宿主在加载持久性实例时将执行以下阶段：A host executes the following stages when loading a persistence instance: 1. 向持久性提供程序发出 和 。Issues the and to the persistence provider. 2. 在持久性事务下执行 I/O。Performs I/O under the persistence transaction. 3. 发布加载的值。Publishes the loaded values. 在最高级别，派生自 类的工作流实例扩展可以参与保留过程的第一个阶段（收集）和第二个阶段（映射），以及加载过程的第三个阶段（发布）。At the highest level, workflow instance extensions that derive from the class can participate in the first (Collect) and second (Map) stages of persisting process and the third stage (Publish) of loading process. 派生自 PersistenceIOParticipant 类的工作流实例扩展另外还可以参与保留过程的第四个阶段以及加载过程的第二个阶段 (I/O)。Workflow instance extensions deriving from the PersistenceIOParticipant class can additionally participate in the fourth stage of the persisting process and the second stage of the loading process (I/O). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个从 派生的类。The following code sample demonstrates creating a class that derives from . 此示例摘自[招聘流程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/hiring-process.md)示例。This example is from the [Hiring Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/hiring-process.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_HiringRequestProcess#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_hiringrequestprocess/cs/hiringrequestpersistenceparticipant.cs#1)]

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CollectValues([out] class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, object>& readWriteValues, [out] class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, object>& writeOnlyValues) cil managed

abstract member CollectValues : * -> unit override this.CollectValues : * -> unit

span.span: The read-write values to be persisted.
The write-only values to be persisted.

summary.span: 宿主对自定义持久性参与者调用此方法，以收集要保留的读/写值和只写值。

span.span: A host invokes this method on a custom persistence participant to collect read-write values and write-only values, to be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主以 集合的 对象的形式将读/写值包装在第一个字典中，并以 对象的形式将只写值包装在第二个字典中（设置了 和 标志）。The host packages read-write values in the first dictionary as objects of an collection, and packages write-only values in the second dictionary as objects with and flags set. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 由一个持久性段内所有持久性参与者之间的 实现提供的每个值均必须具有唯一的 XName。Each value provided by implementations of across all persistence participants within one persistence episode must have a unique XName. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在一个从 派生的类中使用 CollectValues。The following code sample demonstrates using CollectValues in a class that derives from . 此示例摘自[持久性参与者](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md)示例。This example is from the [Persistence Participants](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_PersistenceParticipants#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_persistenceparticipants/cs/stepcountextension.cs#2)]

protected: virtual System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ MapValues(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ readWriteValues, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ writeOnlyValues);

abstract member MapValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> override this.MapValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj>

span.span: The read-write values to be persisted.
The write-only values to be persisted.

summary.span: 当宿主完成在第一个阶段中收集值的工作后，将调用此方法。

span.span: A host invokes this method after it is done with collecting the values in the first stage.

summary.span: 宿主会将由其在第一个阶段（CollectValues 阶段）中从所有持久性参与者中收集的值组成的两个只读字典转发给此方法用于映射。

span.span: The host forwards two read-only dictionaries of values it collected from all persistence participants during the first stage (CollectValues stage) to this method for mapping.

summary.span: 主机会将此方法的返回的字典中的值添加到只写值的集合。

span.span: The host adds values in the dictionary returned by this method to the collection of write-only values.

returns.span: 包含要保留的附加只写值的字典。

span.span: A dictionary containing additional write-only values to be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由所有持久性参与者（包括在第一个阶段（即 CollectValues 阶段）中收集的所有值）之间的所有 方法的实现提供的每个值均必须具有唯一的 XName。Each value provided by implementations of all the methods across all persistence participants including all the values collected in the first stage (CollectValues stage) must have a unique XName. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在一个从 派生的类中使用 MapValues。The following code sample demonstrates using MapValues in a class that derives from . 此示例摘自[企业采购过程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)示例。This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_PurchaseProcess#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_purchaseprocess/cs/xmlpersistenceparticipant.cs#2)]

abstract member PublishValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> unit override this.PublishValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> unit

param.name: readWriteValues
param.span: 从持久性存储中加载的读/写值。

span.span: The read-write values that were loaded from the persistence store.

param.span: 此字典与由在最近的持久性段中保留的读/写值组成的字典相对应。

span.span: This dictionary corresponds to the dictionary of read-write values persisted in the most recent persistence episode.

summary.span: 宿主调用此方法，并传递 集合中所有加载的值（由 或 填充）作为字典参数。

span.span: The host invokes this method and passes all the loaded values in the collection (filled by the or ) as a dictionary parameter.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在一个从 派生的类中使用 PublishValues。The following code sample demonstrates using PublishValues in a class that derives from . 此示例摘自[持久性参与者](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md)示例。This example is from the [Persistence Participants](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md) sample.
